import React from 'react' import '../styles/home.css'; import {motion} from 'framer-motion'; import Typewriter from 'typewriter-effect'; export const Home = () => { return (
{ Typewriter .changeDelay(1000) .typeString("Hello everyone! I'm Leonardo Tolaba an " + 'Industrial Mechanic') .pauseFor(500) .changeDeleteSpeed(10) .deleteChars(22) .typeString("an " + 'Electrician') .pauseFor(500) .deleteChars(14) .typeString("a "+ 'Maintenance Officer') .pauseFor(500) .deleteChars(21) .typeString("an "+ 'Administrative') .pauseFor(500) .deleteChars(17) .typeString("a "+ 'Frontend Developer') .pauseFor(500) .deleteChars(18) .typeString('Backend Developer') .pauseFor(500) .deleteChars(20) .typeString("a "+ 'Fullstack Developer!') .start(); }}> {/*

Hola! Soy Leo Tolaba un Frontend Developer. Bienvenido a mi portafolio!. Si ten√©s alguna duda no dudes en contactarme!

*/}
) }
